EmailTemplate.subject: The key ingredients that define the Modern IP network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Designed to expect the unexpected. Designed to expect the unexpected. Here are some staggering numbers…
There will be:
- 46 billion Internet of Things (IoT) devices by 2020 - A 3.96 ZB/year total traffic increase by 2022 - A 7.9X increase in total wireless traffic from 2017-2022
IP networks are essential to connect humans and devices – instantaneously, intuitively and securely. But here’s the question – will they be able to keep pace with connectivity demands of billions of users?
The Modern IP network will.
What will Modern IP networks look like and how will the address the needs of an increasingly connected world? Find out in our video: Key ingredients that define Modern IP networks <[[https://youtu.be/Isj_K9FzF0s]]>.
Plus, check out our infographic <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201269]]> for more revealing stats and a look at a breakthrough in silicon network processor technology that will power the IP network of the future.
